Reviews.Title: I strongly recommend
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: I strongly recommend this seller and this TV. This is my second model GA6450. This TV is amazing. The quality sound and high definition image become this TV the better cost versus benefit of the current market. It is 3D and Google Tv. You can navigate in any site that you wish. Thank you seller and LG.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful, but not quite what I thought
Reviews.Author: NapaCab "NapaCab"
Reviews.Content: Turns out this is a Google model.  I ordered it to get the same operating experience as my northern home LG Smart TV as I don't have the mental prowess(or patience, not sure which) to learn yet another remote.  The TV is wonderfully crisp and responsive, with a full keyboard on the remote.  This is easier to use than the on sgreen cursor-click keyboard  model I have up north....Oh well, guess I have to buy one more TV.

Reviews.Title: Master Piece from LG
Reviews.Author: Umakanta P.
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV, love it...the picture quality is amazing, 3D is mind blowing...Sound can be more better but ok.Magic remote is a real magic...internet streaming capability is awesome!Recently got one and very happy with the product...Unbeatable product from LG...have it and enjoy your life...

ProductInfo.Features:
The intuitive user interface with the power of Google TV lets you seamlessly search the web with Google Chrome and apps through Google Play to find the entertainment you want.
LG's Cinema 3D technology uses lightweight, battery free glasses to deliver an immersive 3D experience for movies, TV shows and gaming, all with amazing picture quality.
TruMotion 120Hz technology lets you see sports, video games and high-speed action with virtually no motion blur. Now your TV can keep up with your fast- moving entertainment.
Includes 4 pairs of 3D Glasses & Keyboard Remote
ProductInfo.Name: LG 47GA6450 47in Class Cinema 3D 1080P 120hz LED TV with Google TV
